original: Löwenhielm, Gustav Fredrik Cris-pinsson, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 3/ 2/05 i Hasslö, Blek. 1., av major Cris-pin L. o. Ellen Sundblad. G. 34 m. Barbro Örnfelt. Barn: Kristina f. 43. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs real 24, KTH (S) 24-28. Marining:stip. 28-30. Anst. v. A-B Lindholmen-Motala i Gbg, Ho-waldtsvv^erke AG i Kiel o. Hamburg samt Deutsche Werft i Hamburg 28-
translated: Löwenhielm, Gustav Fredrik Cris-pinsson, civil engineer, Gothenburg, b. 3/2/05 in Hasslö, Blekinge, first son of Major Cris-pin L. and Ellen Sundblad. Married in 1934 to Barbro Örnfelt. Children: Kristina b. 1943. Completed high school at Gothenburg Real Gymnasium in 1924, studied at the Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm from 1924-1928. Received a stipend for maritime studies from 1928-1930. Employed by A-B Lindholmen-Motala in Gothenburg, Howaldtsvv^erke AG in Kiel and Hamburg, and Deutsche Werft in Hamburg from 1928 onwards.
